mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_account ( emp_id, password, name, phone, email, position, role, profile_img_url, dept_id, license_no, status, hired_date, created_at ) VALUES ( #{empId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{position}, 'ADMIN', #{profileImgUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId}, #{licenseNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'ACTIVE', NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, d.dept_name FROM admin_account a JOIN department d ON a.dept_id = d.dept_id ORDER BY a.admin_id DESC
SELECT a.*, d.dept_name FROM admin_account a JOIN department d ON a.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE position = 'DOCTOR' ORDER BY a.admin_id DESC
SELECT a.*, d.dept_name FROM admin_account a JOIN department d ON a.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE position IN ('NURSE', 'RADIOLOGIST', 'LAB_TECH', 'ASSISTANT', 'ADMIN') ORDER BY a.admin_id DESC
